data.name: NAME_EMPTY
data.value: Name cannot be empty.

data.name: EMAIL_EMPTY
data.value: Email cannot be empty.

data.name: EMAIL_INVALID
data.value: Email invalid.

data.name: INVALID_PASSWORD
data.value: Your password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and a special character (example: !,?,#.*).

data.name: EMAIL_ALREADY_REGISTERED
data.value: This e-mail is already in use.

data.name: UNKNOWN_ERROR
data.value: Unknown error.

data.name: EMAIL_OR_PASSWORD_INVALID
data.value: Invalid e-mail and/or password.

data.name: USER_WITH_BOARD
data.value: Cannot delete user, because user has associated boards.

data.name: PASSWORD_DIFFERENT_CURRENT_PASSWORD
data.value: The password you entered is different from the current password.

data.name: BOARD_NOT_FOUND
data.value: Board not found, check the id given.

data.name: USER_NOT_FOUND
data.value: No user found with the given email.

data.name: USER_ALREADY_IN_BOARD
data.value: User is already in this board.

data.name: USER_NOT_IN_BOARD
data.value: User not found in this board.

data.name: BOARD_OWNER_CANNOT_BE_REMOVED
data.value: Board owner cannot be removed.

data.name: NEW_POSITION_CANNOT_BE_NEGATIVE
data.value: New Position must be a positive integer.

data.name: COLUMN_NOT_FOUND
data.value: Column not found, check the id given.

data.name: TITLE_CANNOT_BE_EMPTY
data.value: Title cannot be empty.

data.name: CARD_DUE_DATE_CANNOT_BE_FOR_THE_PAST
data.value: Card due date cannot be a past date.

data.name: CARD_NOT_FOUND
data.value: Card not found, check the id given.

data.name: CARD_NOT_IN_COLUMN
data.value: Card not found in this column.
